\pgfplotsset{
    width=.45\textwidth,
    height=.45\textwidth,
}

\begin{axis}[
    name=sharp_recovery,
    xmin=4, xmax=10,
    xtick={4,5,6,7,8,9,10},
    xlabel={Time (s)},
    ylabel={Volume (L)},
    ymin=2.75, ymax=3.75,
    ytick={2.75,3,3.25,3.5,3.75},
    legend pos=north west,
    legend style={nodes={scale=0.6, transform shape}}, % adapted from https://tex.stackexchange.com/a/301112
]

% healthy
\addplot[color=softgreen,style=thick] coordinates {
    % @setfileprefix(data/constriction-stats/d2b951ba10c28e9cfafdb3a67574bd882a649ad3/)
    % @generated(fields='1,6', range=402..=1002, stride=2, 0.01x28s-10d@0%.csv)
};
\addlegendentry{Healthy}
% recovery
\addplot[color=softblue,style=thick] coordinates {
    % @setfileprefix(data/degrade-and-return/3ed8c5cf2279df60ea4b7b353a8c91b6aa202a51/)
    % @generated(fields='1,6', range=2.., stride=2, 10d@80%-10s-tanh:6.10s-0.1s-1.5s.csv)
};
\addlegendentry{Constrict and recover}
\end{axis}

\begin{axis}[
    at={(sharp_recovery.outer south east)}, anchor=outer south west,
    xmin=4, xmax=10,
    xtick={4,5,6,7,8,9,10},
    xlabel={Time (s)},
    ylabel={Flow in (L/s)},
    ymin=-1.25, ymax=1.25,
    ytick={-1,-.5,0,.5,1},
    compat=1.3,
    legend pos=north east,
    legend style={nodes={scale=0.6, transform shape}}, % adapted from https://tex.stackexchange.com/a/301112
]

% healthy
\addplot[color=softgreen,style=thick] coordinates {
    % @setfileprefix(data/constriction-stats/d2b951ba10c28e9cfafdb3a67574bd882a649ad3/)
    % @generated(fields='1,5', range=402..=1002, stride=2, 0.01x28s-10d@0%.csv)
};
\addlegendentry{Healthy}
% recovery
\addplot[color=softblue,style=thick] coordinates {
    % @setfileprefix(data/degrade-and-return/3ed8c5cf2279df60ea4b7b353a8c91b6aa202a51/)
    % @generated(fields='1,5', range=2.., stride=2, 10d@80%-10s-tanh:6.10s-0.1s-1.5s.csv)
};
\addlegendentry{Constrict and recover}

\end{axis}
